title: Interplanetary Passion
description: Jovan Maki is from Pluto. Nichelle Fender is from Earth, worlds apart. So when fate binds them, neither is prepared for the sparks that fly. Passion runs hot, desires left unfulfilled for one explodes for the other. Will the new-found love be strong enough to withstand the viciousness headed their way? Another hot and steamy romance from Jaden Sinclair. Interplanetary Passion is Science Fiction Fantasy to satisfy all of your fantasies.
author: Jaden Sinclair
